channel.title: I need some help on updating my friend's server
channel.description: How do we fix pming people? when you pm someone it kick's them and than make's the system think your on. We also need to know how to make god sword's etc... 2hd. The last question is we got fire wave and all of the normal spell's to work, but the problem is they only work on npc's and not pking how do we make it so you can use in pking?

I am still looking for some help.
